name: socksite
description: A site to track incidents of server cooties on  http://what.thedailywtf.com.
author: Accalia Elementia <Accalia.de.elementia>

scripts.functionalTest: npm install selenium-standalone -g && selenium-standalone install && mocha test\functional\webdriverTests.js
scripts.screenshot: npm install selenium-standalone -g && selenium-standalone install && mocha test\functional\generateScreenshots.js
